website_summaries.verdict: This officially licensed cover offers screen and case protection at a low price.
pros: With an included screen protector and cleaner, this is the best option for protecting the screen in particular
The cover looks great and attaches with hook-and-loop straps
When you're done playing, the cover closes magnetically to keep your screen safe
Joy-Cons can easily be removed, unlike with other case covers
cons: Some gamers find that they prefer to take this case off when they play

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cover for Protection, Slight Inconvenience for Handheld Mode
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Hybrid Cover for my Switch to give extra protection while traveling. It doubles as a simple stand, propping the Switch up at a few different angles, which is beneficial. Somewhat uncomfortable to have on the Switch while playing in handheld mode, as the cover flap is left hanging while playing, but it's usable. This isn't a dealbreaker for me, as I pretty much use this jist for protection while on-the-go, or disconnect the joycons while using the Hybrid Cover as a stand. Finally found a simple carrying case that accommodates the Switch while wrapped in this Hybrid Cover, offering the best of both worlds.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design and functionality - great case for ultimate portability ...

The case also gives you much more viewing angle options (and better sturdiness) than the built-on kickstand does on the Switch unit itself.

customer_reviews.title: Forever Trapped.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of rubish. Good luck trying to get your switch out of this. I had to rip it open to get it out. 30 dollars wasted. I'd recommend sticking to the original nintendo switch hybrid cover. I don't care if you like mario, don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ken™️

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great for travel and road trips. The only downside is that the is no hole for the charging port so you have to take the console out just to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Sonikku

customer_reviews.title: Holds the switch well.
customer_reviews.text: My son tried to put the protector on and was not successful. He really likes that it holds his switch and gives him a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Only problem is that handheld is slightly annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Only problem is that handheld is slightly annoying but the additional backing makes holding it more comfortable (but your fingers have to deal with the flap)
